description: Explore the tokenomics of Drip Network, a DeFi platform on Binance Smart Chain, focusing on its structures, incentives, and sustainability. Understand the potential and risks involved with the native DRIP token and how community governance plays a crucial role.
keywords: Drip Network, DRIP token, DeFi, tokenomics, Binance Smart Chain, staking, passive income, deflationary model, community governance, cryptocurrency, financial systems
title: Exploring the Tokenomics of Drip Network
